title: ACTREC Notification 2026 - Walk-in-Interview for 02 Research Associate and Research Administrative Coordinator Posts
description: The Advanced Centre for Treatment Research and Education in Cancer (ACTREC) has declared the latest job notification for 02 Research Associate and Research Administrative Coordinator Jobs. Candidates who have qualified in the M.Sc, MBBS, BDS, Post Graduation, Pharm D, M.Pharm, M.E/ M.Tech can grab this chance and apply for the ACTREC Notification 2026 . Here, we included the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. I...
